install.name: System - JoomdCaptcha
install.author: Danish Babu
install.description: Provides a captcha image and checks to ensure it is valid.

param.name: length
param.label: Word Length
param.description: How many letters must the captcha have?

param.name: txtcolor
param.label: Text Color
param.description: Color of Text (ex: '20,40,60' for RED=20, GREEN=40, BLUE=60). Left blank for random.

param.name: bgcolor
param.label: Background Color
param.description: Color of Background (ex: '20,40,60' for RED=20, GREEN=40, BLUE=60). Left blank for random.
